lead_paragraph: Radek Faksa had a goal and an assist and Kari Lehtonen stopped 31 shots for the Dallas Stars in a 2-1 victory against the St. Louis Blues in Game 1 of their second-round series on Friday at American Airlines Center.

headline.print_headline: Faksa Scores Winner as Stars Beat Blues in Series Opener
headline.main: Faksa Scores Winner as Stars Beat Blues in Series Opener

snippet: Radek Faksa had a goal and an assist and Kari Lehtonen stopped 31 shots for the Dallas Stars in a 2-1 victory against the St. Louis Blues in Game 1 of their second-round series on Friday at American Airlines Center....
